== dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: '1.1'

leader:
  description: a leadership
  type: leadership

  leader:
    description: a leader
    multi: true
    default:
      jinja: |
        val1
        val2
      description: returns val1 and val2

  follower1:  # a first follower

  follower2:  # a second follower
----
